languages.text: Вольного Торговца обманом заставили принять участие в гладиаторских боях. Тот, кто сделал это, скорее всего находится в Яме, логове Ревущих. Стоит наведаться туда, чтобы свести счеты, а также разжиться хорошей экипировкой из запасов, собранных Злобой.

The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.
languages.original_text: Вольного Торговца обманом заставили принять участие в гладиаторских боях. Тот, кто сделал это, скорее всего находится в Яме, логове Ревущих. Стоит наведаться туда, чтобы свести счеты, а также разжиться хорошей экипировкой из запасов, собранных Злобой.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

languages.text: 行商浪人被人骗去当了角斗士，欺骗{mf|他|她}的人很可能就在尖啸者的巢穴之中。如果行商浪人打算进行报复的话，应该去那里看看，说不定还可以从恶棍的商店中弄到些不错的装备。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人被人骗去当了角斗士，欺骗{mf|他|她}的人很可能就在尖啸者的巢穴之中。如果行商浪人打算进行报复的话，应该去那里看看，说不定还可以从恶棍的商店中弄到些不错的装备。

languages.text: 自由開拓者はグラディエイターとして戦う羽目になった。この状況をお膳立てした犯人は、シュリーカーの巣窟であるピットで見つけられるかもしれない。借りを返すつもりがあるのならば、またマリスの店のまともな装備を備えたいのであれば、そこが自由開拓者の向かうべき場所である。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はグラディエイターとして戦う羽目になった。この状況をお膳立てした犯人は、シュリーカーの巣窟であるピットで見つけられるかもしれない。借りを返すつもりがあるのならば、またマリスの店のまともな装備を備えたいのであれば、そこが自由開拓者の向かうべき場所である。

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a été {mf|poussé|poussée} à combattre comme {mf|gladiateur|gladiatrice}. La personne responsable de cette ruse se trouve probablement dans la Fosse, le repaire des Hurleurs. C'est là que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit se rendre {mf|s'il|si elle} veut se venger ou se procurer de l'équipement correct des boutiques de Malice.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a été {mf|poussé|poussée} à combattre comme {mf|gladiateur|gladiatrice}. La personne responsable de cette ruse se trouve probablement dans la Fosse, le repaire des Hurleurs. C'est là que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit se rendre {mf|s'il|si elle} veut se venger ou se procurer de l'équipement correct des boutiques de Malice.

languages.text: Han engañado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para acabar luchando en la arena. El artífice de esto se encuentra en el Pozo, la guarida de los Aulladores. Este es el lugar al que debe ir {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente si desea buscar venganza, y también para hacerse con un equipo de calidad en las tiendas de Malicia.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

traits.locale_text: Han engañado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para acabar luchando en la arena. El artífice de esto se encuentra en el Pozo, la guarida de los Aulladores. Este es el lugar al que debe ir {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente si desea buscar venganza, y también para hacerse con un equipo de calidad en las tiendas de Malicia.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wurde mit einem Trick dazu gebracht, als {mf|Gladiator|Gladiatorin} zu kämpfen. Die Schuldige hält sich vermutlich im Loch auf, dem Versteck der Kreischer. Dorthin sollte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gehen, um abzurechnen ... und sich mit Ausrüstung aus Tückes Lagern einzudecken.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wurde mit einem Trick dazu gebracht, als {mf|Gladiator|Gladiatorin} zu kämpfen. Die Schuldige hält sich vermutlich im Loch auf, dem Versteck der Kreischer. Dorthin sollte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gehen, um abzurechnen ... und sich mit Ausrüstung aus Tückes Lagern einzudecken.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, gladyatör olarak savaşması için tuzağa düşürüldü. Bunu yapan kişi, Çığırtkanların ini Çukur'da bulunabilir. Hür Tacir, onlarla hesaplaşmak ve Melanet'in stoklarından güzel teçhizat almak istiyorsa buraya gitmeli.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader was tricked into fighting as a gladiator. The one who did this can likely be found in the Pit, the den of the Shriekers. That is where the Rogue Trader should go if {mf|he|she} wants to get even — and also to equip {mf|himself|herself} with decent gear from Malice's stores.
